title: Bent card trick
text:
A chosen card is bent (so we can recognize it) and lost in the middle of the deck. It then magically rises and pops back up on top of the deck.

  1. Perform a double lift
  2. Bend the card, but not too much. Do not create a crease.
  3. Place the top card in the middle of the deck.
  4. Keep your left thumb pressing on the top of the deck to not reveal the second bent card.
  5. Transfer your deck into a side grip and keep the top card flat with your left thumb and middle finger.
  6. Release the pressure with your fingers to make the top card pop.
